## âœ… Checklist

### General
- [ ] I have read the [CONTRIBUTING.md](../CONTRIBUTING.md) guide
- [ ] My changes follow the book's style (see [docs/STYLE_GUIDE.md](../docs/STYLE_GUIDE.md))
- [ ] I have tested that the PDF compiles without errors

### For Content Changes
- [ ] My explanation includes intuition before formal definitions
- [ ] I've included or updated "Connection to LLMs" where appropriate
- [ ] I've used relatable analogies (not dry textbook language)
- [ ] I've avoided words like "obviously," "trivially," "simply"

### For LaTeX/Diagram Changes
- [ ] I've used the predefined environments (theorem, definition, example, etc.)
- [ ] TikZ diagrams use consistent styling with existing diagrams
- [ ] No overfull/underfull hbox warnings introduced
